DrFeifei’s research highlights model’s focus on mathematical reasoning using a large-scale math corpus and GRPO for reinforcement learning, achieving strong results on English and Chinese benchmarks. 🧮💡 #AI #MathModel
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.03300
The model excels over open-source rivals 🚀 #AIAdvancements #TechTrend
